body:
During late stages of the war, camps faced mass starvation and illness. This was because supply and infrastructure were being destroyed. Plenty of so called holocaust survivors have themselves been brainwashed to reshape what horrors they experienced to fit a narrative, and some are outright lying. Likewise, testimonies are not reliable especially when they receive financial benefits, and personnel gain. Actual evidence of a planned holocaust is so lacking as to be non-existent.

Might be worth pointing out that the soldiers in the photo are horrified and ashamed of what they are being shown. So if this is how random German soldiers react, then it weights on the side that Germans at large were not evil or willing to inflict a holocaust.

We can maybe test this:
https://collections.ushmm.org/search/catalog/pa1175239

If we can identify the soldier, the camp it was taken at, and the way the people in the photo died, maybe we will get an indication of the validity of what the German soldiers are watching.

body:
The blueprints of Auschwitz are still around (although difficult to find in hi-def on the internet....)

The alleged gas chamber are literally on the blueprint at "lichenkellar" or "corpse cellar". i.e., where one keeps dead bodies... underground.

Why would anyone build a gas chamber for 2000 people underground and then have to carry each of the dead bodies up one at a time to burn them in a oven?

The blueprints of Auschwitz are still around (although difficult to find in hi-def on the internet....)

The alleged gas chamber are literally on the blueprint at "lichenkellar" or "corpse cellar". i.e., where one keeps dead bodies... underground.
